roleset.name: extend horizontally and ungracefully
roleset.note: SPRAWL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sprawl' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 47.6 and 50, Framenet entry Posture. (from sprawl.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: odd agentive example
example.text: Like Peter Sellars, [Ms. Bogart]-1 manipulates her actors as if they were rag dolls, [*-1]sprawling them on staircases, dangling them off tables, even hanging them from precipices while having them perform some gymnastic feats of derring-do.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: It is typical of most such surveys , which are commonplace in an art scene now sprawling from Berlin to Beijing .
